## BlockSvg.moveNumberedInputBefore() method

Move a numbered input to a different location on this block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
moveNumberedInputBefore(inputIndex: number, refIndex: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  inputIndex | number | Index of the input to move. |
|  refIndex | number | Index of input that should be after the moved input. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
